Title: Relates to requiring disclosure of addiction risks for certain prescription drugs
Summary: Requires disclosure of addiction risks for certain prescription drugs; requires physicians, nurses and pharmacists to provide information on prevention, mitigation and treatment of prescription drug addiction and to have the patient sign a form acknowledging education of such risks.
LawCode: Add ยง3317, Pub Health L; add ยง19.18-c, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring disclosure of addiction risks for certain prescription drugs
